Headline: #N5 South Shore Night Bus Temporary Reroute at 75th/Yates
ShortDescription: N5 South Shore Night Bus buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Yates, 76th, and South Shore, due to street blockage near 75th/Yates.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#N5 South Shore Night Bus buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, Yates, 76th, and South Shore, due to street blockage near 75th/Yates.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Garfield. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Garfield.

Note: Shuttle buses are available between 69th and 35th to provide connecting service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
